system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefit

When using a grenade launcher, rocket launcher, or mortar the character makes attack rolls with the weapon normally.

Normal

A character who uses a weapon without being proficient with it takes a -4 penalty on attack rolls
